name: Scratch Cat Runner
description:
V2.0.3

UPDATE: Added Sans

INSTRUCTIONS: You have to collect diamonds to get a high score. avoid the ghosts & Rocks and anything else, they can hurt you. collect hearts to heal up 

STORY:  The game is about a cat that runs to the main goal, and getting somewhere

There is a hidden boss level in the game that you have to find.

Controls: Space for all levels, WASD & Arrow keys for the Boss level

This is my biggest project yet 

I hope you enjoy it
